body_html: @KarenUllrich it seems that you have an MKL in your $LD_LIBRARY_PATH that is taking precedence over the MKL that anaconda ships. If you use conda installs, you might want to remove that MKL reference from your LD_LIBRARY_PATH (pytorch wont be the only package that will have an issue, any package that depends on anaconda-mkl will break)

body: @KarenUllrich it seems that you have an MKL in your $LD_LIBRARY_PATH that is taking precedence over the MKL that anaconda ships. If you use conda installs, you might want to remove that MKL reference from your LD_LIBRARY_PATH (pytorch wont be the only package that will have an issue, any package that depends on anaconda-mkl will break)
